Record Class PluginJsonWriter

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.burchard36.api.data.json.writer.PluginJsonWriter
public record PluginJsonWriter(com.google.gson.Gson gson) extends Record
A Json writer, uses class serialization to write/read from files from Gson
